data.title: Bangaru Papa - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Bangaru Papa with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
1954

3 hr 3 mins

Drama, Family

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Kotayya is a kind man who marries Rami. Later, Rami and Gopala Swamy plan and send Kottaya to jail. Once Kotayya gets released from the jail, he is determined to kill Gopala Swamy to fulfil his revenge. Suddenly a situation arises where a baby girl comes under his guardianship after her mother's tragic death. Kotayya becomes responsible and affectionate for the girl Papa leaving his anger and revenge.
